description: Welcome to Secret Ridge on beautiful Burke Mountain! This 4-bed, 3-bath, 2,299 sq ft townhome offers rare rancher-style living with the primary bedroom and laundry on the main floor—perfect for downsizers. Enjoy air conditioning, parking for 4 cars, upgraded granite countertops throughout, a bright open-concept main floor, and a lovely south-facing outlook that fills the space with natural light. Upstairs you'll find three spacious bedrooms, while the fully renovated basement features over-height ceilings, a fantastic rec room, full bathroom, and an additional bedroom—ideal for guests or extended family. Located in a coveted community known for its tranquility and natural beauty, this home combines comfort, style, and function in one thoughtfully designed package.
